name: template.beta.gouv.fr
description: A CSS UI kit for betagouv and friends

scripts.build-css: npm run generate-custom-properties && postcss --output dist/css/template.css src/css/template.css && NODE_ENV=production postcss --output dist/css/template.min.css src/css/template.css
scripts.build-resources: copyfiles -f src/img/* dist/img && copyfiles -f src/img/icons/**/* dist/img/icons && copyfiles -f 'src/fonts/Source Sans Pro/*' 'dist/fonts/Source Sans Pro/' && copyfiles -f 'src/fonts/Evolventa/*' 'dist/fonts/Evolventa/'
scripts.build: rm -Rf dist && npm run build-resources && npm run build-css

author: beta.gouv.fr
